name: Tomatoad
description:
It's Tomatoad! Play as this lil toad and collect some beads in a garden shed.  

This is my very first game, mostly made to showcase my ability to create assets and to demonstrate how they look in action.  I had a lot of fun animating Tomatoad and building the environment.  

There are some small bugs that I'm aware of and I'll hopefully be able to put out a completely fixed version in time! Enjoy! 

Arrow keys to move, space bar to jump.
